column3:
(Dibrugarh East - In order to lessen water from logged areas 05 Nos. of Dewatering pump have been operating under Dibrugarh East Revenue
Circle-
1. Tinikunia Pump, Graham Bazar, 2. Near Dibrugarh Municipality Corporation Pump, Graham Bazar, 3. Near Garbage dumpyard area pump,
Maijan, 4. Thakurbari pump, Maijan, 5. Natun Gaon pump, Maijan. Further, cleaning and excavation activities of blocked drains are being
carried out in different areas by the concern Line Departments and Dibrugarh Municipal Corporation to minimize the water logging problem
which arises due to flash flood.
